title: Da Zhonghua Xunbao Ji
synopsis: "Treasure Hunt in Greater China" is a 52-episode cartoon jointly produced by Shanghai Jingding Animation Technology Co., Ltd. and 21st Century Publishing Group. The cartoon was released on CCTV Children’s Channel (CCTV-14) on December 20, 2018. Premiere. The cartoon "Treasure Hunt in Great China" tells the story of a treasure hunting youth team composed of Mick, Guoguo, Yueban and others traveling through China with the five-element monsters, in Shanghai, Beijing, Tianjin, Chongqing, Shandong, and Sichuan. The thrilling and exciting treasure hunt story unfolded repeatedly. From Peking opera facial makeup, clay figurine Zhang Caishou to Confucius Temple, from Goubuli steamed buns, Beijing roast duck to Chongqing hot pot... These knowledge elements such as traditional Chinese culture and special cuisine are all integrated into the storyline, allowing the audience to follow the protagonist in the film In the adventurous footsteps, embarking on an enjoyable trip to China (translated from iqiyi)
